name: Hammer
description: The variety of Rice that we are offering to the market is Parboiled Rice. In accordance to the length of the grains.

name: Wrench
description: The variety of Flour that we are offering to the market is White Flour. We package our Flour in automatic machine.

name: Pliers
description: The variety of Lentil that we are offering to the market is Red Lentil. Lentils must be fresh and in good Shape.
